channel.title: Clone source of RSC? Possible?
channel.description:
Hiya guys,
I was wondering if there is a source out there that is exactly or very close to an exact clone of RuneScape classic. No portals, every skill working, basically a source that if you didn't know you wouldn't be able to tell the difference from it to Jagex's version of the game. I'm sure you can change this option whenever however I'm not a guru coder but if it isn't possible then max exp rate being x2 or x3. I wan't the server to be exactly like RSC except for the exp rate. Is this possible? I hope I don't get flamed because I did use the search engine and tried to find a post related to this and looked for 10 minutes but couldn't find anything. I would really appreciate an answer as I am really dedicated to do it I would love it for a response so I can start up a server :)

item.title: Clone source of RSC? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“wackyherb, post:5, topic:427485”][quote author=latifundio link=topic=530183.msg3870987#msg3870987 date=1325341570]
Moparscape classic not exactly a clone, but it is open source. Client
[/quote]

Sorry to sound like a noob but what does open source mean :$?[/quote]
Means source code is available to the public domain.

Read full topic

item.title: Clone source of RSC? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @wackyherb wackyherb
item.description:
@wackyherb wrote:

NoLives:

Mopar is SAID to be in beta in a few days/weeks.

Alright, doesn’t really answer what open source means? Wanna explain more aha and is there and sources for RSCAngel then?

Read full topic

item.title: Clone source of RSC? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @wackyherb wackyherb
item.description:
@wackyherb wrote:

Vicd:

RSCAngel’s or Mopar’s.

So in these sources these are exactly or almost exactly like Jagexs version of RSC? Even in RSCEmulation they have portals, its a small thing but its one thing that ruins the experience for me a bit because its not realistic. Can you provide a bit of information on each (I have played RSCA before it got shut down and I do believe it was exactly like RSC. That would be perfect if I could get these sources, are they available for download?

Thanks for the speedy response
Cheers!

Read full topic
